remarks: If an element of a Tarski class is an ordinal number, its successor is an element of the class.  JFM CLASSES2 th. 6 (partly).  (Contributed by FL, 22-Feb-2011.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2014.)
statement: tsksuc $p |- ( ( T e. Tarski /\ A e. On /\ A e. T ) -> suc A e. T ) $.
